A '''potion of Invisibility''' is a potion that provides [[Invisibility]] when used.

== Obtaining ==
=== Brewing ===
{{Brewing
|head = 1
|Fermented Spider Eye
|base = Potion of Night Vision
|Potion of Invisibility
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing
|Fermented Spider Eye
|base = Potion of Night Vision Extended
|Potion of Invisibility Extended
|name = Extended Potion of Invisibility
|ingredients = [[Fermented Spider Eye]] +<br> Extended [[Potion of Night Vision]]
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing
|Redstone Dust
|base = Potion of Invisibility
|Potion of Invisibility Extended
|name = Extended Potion of Invisibility
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing
|Gunpowder
|base2=Potion of Invisibility
|base3= Potion of Invisibility Extended
|
|Splash Potion of Invisibility
|Splash Potion of Invisibility Extended
|name = Splash Potion of Invisibility
|ingredients = [[Gunpowder]] +<br> '''Potion of Invisibility'''
}}
{{Brewing
|Dragon's Breath
|base2=Splash Potion of Invisibility
|base3=Splash Potion of Invisibility Extended
|
|Lingering Potion of Invisibility
|Lingering Potion of Invisibility Extended
|name = Lingering Potion of Invisibility
|ingredients = [[Dragon's Breath]] +<br> '''Splash Potion of Invisibility'''
|foot=1
}}

=== Mob loot ===
[[Wandering trader]]s have an 8.5% chance of dropping a potion of Invisibility if they die while they are drinking the potion.

=== Trading ===
[[Wandering trader]]s can sell extended potions of Invisibility for 5 [[emerald]]s.
{{Trade sources}}
